text: Stanley Sydney McPherson Dean was the manager of the New Zealand national rugby union team on their tour of Australia in 1922 and the 'Invincibles' of 1924-1925 who went unbeaten on their tour of Britain, Ireland and France. He later managed the New Zealand Maori team in Fiji 1938. He received an Order of the British Empire in the 1951 New Years Honours.
